Half-Life = An awesome 1990's throwback game that's still fun to play.

Half-Life 2 = Arguably the greatest first-person shooter of all time. Also provided the foundation for all Source engine games.

Half-LIfe 2: Episode One = An excellent continuation of the Half-Life 2 storyline.

Half-Life 2: Episode Two = Why everyone wants Half-Life 3.

Fantastico, eccezzionale, HL2 episodio 1 e 2 gli episodi sono assolutamente due giochi che tutti dovrebbero provare almeno una volta! L'episodio 1 non mi ha colpito molto, dato che, secondo me, serve solamente a collegarlo con episodio 2. Infatti se li avessero messi in un unico gioco l'avrebbero chiamato Half-Life 3, cosa del tutto impossibile dato che, come per Half Life 2, deve stupire e intrattenere il giocatore in modi nuovi. 
Ora trovati un lavoro, guadagna 10 euri e comprati questi due capolavori!






Gmod REVOLUTION ep.3 confermato!
结局令人悲伤，篇幅太短，差评！

I swear to Gaben, if Left 4 Dead 3 is released before we see what happens after the fantastic climax of this game in Half-Life 3, I'm gonna fly off the handle. I'm gonna do some sort of acrobatic fucking PIROUETTE off the handle and win like a medal or some shit.

Continues on the story, and has a good mix of combat and puzzle solving. Good music, too. Compared to the previous two games, I know this game inside and out, where to go, what to do, and exactly when and how to do it. And it doesn't get old; that's how fun it is.

The Half-Life 2 equivalent of Opposing Force. More adventureous, better plotline than Episode One, better puzzles, better everything! In addition to the improved gameplay and graphics, you'll encounter new characters and enemies everywhere you go. Half-Life 2: Episode is not only the second best in the Half-Life 2 story arc, but it is also visually more colorful. Get it if you don't have it already!

P.S: That cliffhanger though... man.

Que si vale la pena comrarlo?.Porsupuesto que vale la pena comprarlo, toda la saga es interesante desde su comienzo hasta su final, lo unico que se puede hacer despues de terminar tan grandioso juego es esperar para que anuncien Hal-Life episodio 3 y cuando llegue ese tan esperado momento, se que mas de uno estara dispuesto a lanzar sus billeteras para comprarlo.

The best half-life there is.
They took the best of all the HL2 and merged it together.
The gameplay changes up enough to stay fresh, but always feels like the same game.
The plot picks up quite a ton, and it is what makes the series worth playing.
Also, one of my Top 10 games of all time. (Including HL2/EP1)
After you beat this game, it will make you realize why everyone wants Half-Life 3.

BUT WHERE IS HALF-LIFE 2: EPISODE ZERO

Только в 2014 году довелось сыграть Half-Life 2. как-то не заинтересовывала она. Купил по акции, был приятно удивлён. Вопросы к игре есть, но для 2004 года. это, просто отвал башки! 
Вся игра - спринтерский забег, мы постояно движемся вперёд, только иногда лишь останавливаясь. Мне подобное не совсем по душе - однообразно, но это корявая придирка. )
Полно плюсов: физика, графика, искус. интел., локации, повествование, не большие головоломки, оригинальность и многое другое.
Больше всего понравился второй эпизод (дополнение). Здесь лучше всё скомпоновано. Два новых врага. Интересная и очень красивая локация, где мы проходим в поисках экстракта. Грустный финал.
Не верилось, что нет окончания сюжета. Думал есть ещё одно дополнение, но... 
Слишком затянули с продолжением, а оно нужно, иначе не было смысла проходить всё это. Послевкусие не завершённости и чувство, что тебя обманули.
Игра шедевр.

its a deliciously great game and can easily build up many amazing memories but it needs a sequel for a fact and when that sequel comes out me and atleast 90% of the worlds population will be happy i have been waiting since 2008 for a sequel and i still am i will be waiting and i will always have hope for the new game to be there i jus need to believe

Perhaps the best of all half life, it's expansions and half life 2/episodes.  Certainly the most well paced, the best set pieces and the best story. Wondering why people have been screaming for half life 3 for 10 years? play this through to one of the biggest unresolved cliffhangers in gaming and you'll understand why. Valve at their very best, which is obviously saying a lot.
gabe newell por favor cade a continuação do classico half-life

I have to say, this installment of the episodes of Half-Life really got to me.  It's about 3 times as long as the episode before it and is full of juicy story.  Its hard and gives quite the challenge even to seasoned gamers.  especilly if you go for the achievements.  Overall the only downside is the major cliff hanger at the end, but I'll leave that for you to find out.

Half Life is the BEST game in the world, you don't need to know anything else!

The last in the epic series so far, this is a must play for all fps and half lovers alike. 

The story takes an important turn in this installment and the game ends in a cliffhanger.

Many loyal fans all over the world including me are still eagerly waiting for the next installment in the series from valve. And there have been no scarcity of half life marathons in an attempt to reignite this series.

There have been rumours that the next (hl3?) is in the works but I just hope that it comes out before 2020 (thats when half life 2 takes place btw) :D

Back to episode 2, just get it!
